name: Windowsill Animal Interview
description: Photorealistic animal interview on windowsill with human-like gestures and voice responses
promptTemplate: A realistic {animal} sitting on a windowsill, calmly gazing outside. Quiet home interior with natural daylight pouring through a window, sheer curtains gently swaying. A reporter appears next to the window with a microphone and asks, 'What should people do after watching this video?' The {animal} turns to the camera, raises one paw — now anatomically adjusted to form a perfect human-like {gesture} — and confidently says in English, 'Like it.' Photorealistic with light surreal enhancement — real fur, lighting, and movement, but the paw forms a clearly defined gesture like a human hand. Camera starts with a mid-shot over the reporter's shoulder, cuts to a tight front-facing close-up of the {animal}'s gesture and face, ends with a slow zoom-out for comedic timing. Peaceful and homey atmosphere with whimsical twist, using soft color tones and warm light.
